title: Exercise: Map Schema Dynamically with the SchemaMapper

questions.question: What is the difference between using a SchemaMapper to map attributes in a dynamic translation versus an AttributeManager?
options: The AttributeManager can map feature types.
The AttributeManager requires the schema be known in advance.
The AttributeManager requires you to write Python code.

questions.question: What would happen to the output of this workspace if someone added a new attribute to the FireHalls GML layer and did not update the CommunityMapAdvancedSchema.xlsx file to include it?
options: FME would not write the new attribute.
FME would write the new attribute, but it wouldn't have any values.
FME would write the new attribute, and it would have values.
The SchemaMapper would produce an error, and the workspace would fail.
